message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11500. It's a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe we can come to an even better agreement. I am willing to pay $10000 for your product.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $10000 is simply too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $10750?  It's a fair price considering the value of the product to you.
Alice, thank you for your offer. I am still interested in purchasing your product, but I am unable to go above $10500. This is the highest amount I am willing to pay.
